title: Aru bandavaravva
sahitya:
Aru bandavaravva Aravanallade mAra janakanAda sheLariyallade matte


caraNam 1    hejjagaLiduta kANisadandire mrdu gejjeya dhvani kELi barutalire 
vajra mANika hAra haridu nelake biddu majjigeyoLagina beNNe kANenamma
    caraNam 2    kombu koLala tuttUri Udutalikku imbu kastUri parimaLa susuta 
bombaTTe cellaNa sOsida mosarina kumbha oDedu kesarAgideyamma
    caraNam 3    mincinandadi hoLeyuta badiyallidda sancitArthagaLella surADita 
vancaneyillade bhaktara salahida sancukAra purandara viTTalanallade
